description: This file defines the HomeFragment class for an Android app, representing the main dashboard UI. It displays activity summaries, weekly progress, and highlights using various UI components and repositories.

classes.name: HomeFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that displays the main dashboard with activity summaries, weekly charts, and quick stats.
